scripts.asbuild:custom: asc assembly/index.ts -O3 --runtime stub --noAssert -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat -d build/wasm.d.ts
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.full: clear; echo '---------'; npm run asbuild:custom; echo '---------'; node ./index.js;echo '---------'
